alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 01 at 3:32PM CST until January 03 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... .WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Northern Newton and Northern Jasper Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 4 AM to 9 AM CST Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
